meanings.definition: A meeting in which participants communicate via video and audio technology.
meanings.sent1: During the videoconference, everyone could see and hear each other on the screen.
meanings.sent2: We had a videoconference with our colleagues from different offices to discuss the project.
meanings.sent3: The videoconference was like having a virtual gathering with friends from around the world.
meanings.sent4: In the videoconference, it felt as if we were all in the same room, despite being miles apart.
meanings.sent5: The videoconference made the distance between us disappear, making it feel like we were all together.

meanings.definition: To participate in a meeting using video and audio technology.
meanings.sent1: I will videoconference with the team tomorrow to go over the presentation.
meanings.sent2: She videoconferenced with her clients to provide them with updates on the project.
meanings.sent3: He videoconferenced with his family to celebrate his birthday together virtually.
meanings.sent4: They videoconference regularly to stay connected with their friends who live far away.
meanings.sent5: Videoconferencing allows us to have face-to-face meetings without leaving our homes.
